<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ley Line Rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=1537)</title>

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 216 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Those who build a stronghold on a ley line might use rituals to increase their advantage. The following rituals allow easier or more powerful benefits from ley lines.

[_Empower ley line_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=65), [_establish nexus_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=66)
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
